meanings: give a warm[cordial] reception[welcome] to a guest

vlive.korean: 저의 초대 손님입니다! These are my invited guests. 듣기 View video ITZY : 🖤

vlive.english: A guest with lots of money is the king.

examples.korean: Luncheon will be served at one, Madam. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오찬은 1시에 준비됩니다, 손님. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The guests left in an alcoholic haze. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 손님들은 술에 취해 몽롱한 상태로 떠났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The guests left in an alcoholic haze. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: An expectant hush fell on the guests. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 손님들이 기대감으로 갑자기 조용해졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: An expectant hush fell on the guests. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Each guest had to pony up $40 for the meal. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 손님 각각이 식사비로 40달러를 내야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Each guest had to pony up $40 for the meal. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Food will be served in the hospitality tent. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 음식은 손님 접대용 천막에서 제공됩니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
